pr_title: Adapt to changes in IdentityHashMap annotations

timeline.message: Better annotations and suppress warnings so the build is not broken
Add documentation and annotations; revert a change

timeline.bodyText:
@mernst Why is it desirable to make this @Nullable TransferResult?
It would have been nicer to check whether the get in the body returns an unexpected null and then abort with an error.
timeline.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText: That would have been a code change.  I was only changing annotations.  I don't object to such a change in a different pull request.  Thanks for the suggestion.
replies.author: mernst
